name: A small game search for partner
name_original: A small game search for partner
description: I am a student of China. This game is one of my idea which my teammate don't like.So I do it alone and wish there are other people who like it and want to  finish the game with me. If you also like the game and want to create  a small cute game together , please try to reply me or send the email to me.thanks.
